dict.acceptation: 意识，观念；知觉；觉悟；感觉；

sent.orig: The four ingredients of consciousness are awareness of consciousness,content of consciousness,intentionality of consciousness,and affection of consciousness.
sent.trans: 意识的四个要素是意识觉醒、意识内容、意识指向和意识感情。

sent.orig: Independence consciousness, anxiety-consciousness, carefulness consciousness and revere consciousness to life.
sent.trans: 主要表现为缺失意识、恐惧意识、关怀意识和对生命的敬畏意识。

sent.orig: In this article, the author focuses on the anti-feudalism consciousness, tragedy consciousness and animadversion consciousness.
sent.trans: 本文主要论述了意识倾向变化中的反封建意识、悲剧意识和批判意识。

sent.orig: Hold to central group study, enhance clean-fingered consciousness and party spirit consciousness.
sent.trans: 坚持中心组学习，增强廉洁意识和党性意识。

sent.orig: Consciousness of desalt administration area, enhance region economy consciousness, desalt government action, aggrandizement market action.
sent.trans: 淡化行政区域意识，增强区域经济意识，淡化政府行为，强化市场行为。
